name: telegram-contacts-poc
description: Crypto Wallet + Telegram Contact Retrieval POC

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.db:reset: psql -h localhost -U poc_telegram_contacts -d poc_telegram_contacts -c "DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA public; GRANT USAGE ON SCHEMA public TO poc_telegram_contacts; GRANT CREATE ON SCHEMA public TO poc_telegram_contacts;" && npm run db:setup
